pull.title: rpc: add weight to getmempoolentry output
pull.body:
Rebase of #14649 (which itself was a rebase of #11256).

Squash the two test related commits, and swapped out `size` usage for `vsize`.

Added a commit with release notes.

events.body: @conscott @meshcollider @esotericnonsense  did you want to re-review here? Maybe we'll get this in before the commits hit their second birthday 🍰 .
utACK looks good to me (two years, ahh!)
